substitution.copyText: A King of shredsa nd patches.
Save me and hover o're me with your wings
substitution.amendedText: Save me and hover o're me with your wings,

substitution.copyText: You heavenly guards what would your gracious fire?
substitution.amendedText: You heavenly guards! what would your gracious form?

substitution.copyText: Do you not come your tardy son to chide
substitution.amendedText: Do you not come your tardy son to chide,

substitution.copyText: That lap'st in time, and person lets go by

substitution.copyText: How is it with you Lady?
substitution.amendedText: How is it with you, Lady?

substitution.copyText: My father in his habit as he liv'd
substitution.amendedText: My father in his habit as he liv'd!

substitution.copyText: Look where he goes, even now out at the portal,
substitution.amendedText: Look, where he goes, even now out at the portal,

substitution.copyText: This bodiless creation extasie is very cunning in.
Would make them capable. do not look up on me
substitution.amendedText: Would make them capable: do not look on me
